title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for implicit differentiation

1 point is earned if verifies expression for dy/dx

6 y 2 dy dx +6 x 2 dy dx +12xy−24x+6 dy dx =0

dy dx ( 6 y 2 +6 x 2 +6 )=24x−12xy

dy dx = 24x−12xy 6 x 2 +6 y 2 +6 = 4x−2xy x 2 + y 2 +1
